00003 #define _BSD_SOURCE 1
00004 
00005 #include "cap.h"
00006 #include <pthread.h>
00007 #include <stdio.h>
00008 #include <stdlib.h>
00009 #include <string.h>
00010 
00011 
00012 cap_config *new_cap_config()
00013 {
00014     cap_config *c = (cap_config *) malloc(sizeof(cap_config));
00015     snprintf(c->dev,10,"%s","");//c->dev = NULL;
00016     snprintf(c->errbuf,PCAP_ERRBUF_SIZE,"%s","");//c->errbuf = NULL;
00017     snprintf(c->filter_app,3,"%s","ip");
00018     //c->filter_app = "ip";
00019     c->netp=0;
00020     c->maskp=0;
00021     c->numOfPackets = 0;
00022     c->snap_len = 1518;
00023     c->descr=NULL;
00024     return c;
00025 }
00026 
00027 
00028 
00029 int start_capture(pcap_handler func, u_char * arg, cap_config * c,
00030                   int onlineCapMode, char *offLineFile)
00031 {
00032 
00033 
00034     pcap_lookupnet(c->dev, &(c->netp), &(c->maskp), c->errbuf);
00035     if (onlineCapMode == 1) {
00036         /* set our capture device */
00037         if (strlen(c->dev) == 0) {
00038             snprintf(c->dev,10,"%s",pcap_lookupdev(c->errbuf));
00039         }
00040         /* open capture device in online mode */
00041         c->descr = pcap_open_live(c->dev, c->snap_len, 1, 0, c->errbuf);
00042         if (c->descr == NULL) {
00043             fprintf(stderr, " (pcap_open_live failed)");
00044             return PCAP_OPEN_LIVE_ERROR;
00045         }
00046     } else {
00047         /* open capture device in offline mode */
00048         c->descr = pcap_open_offline(offLineFile, c->errbuf);
00049         if (c->descr == NULL) {
00050             fprintf(stderr, " (pcap_open_offline failed)");
00051             return PCAP_OPEN_LIVE_ERROR;
00052         }
00053     }
00054 
00055     /* apply the rules */
00056     if (pcap_compile(c->descr, &(c->fp), c->filter_app, 0, c->netp) == -1) {
00057         fprintf(stderr, " (pcap_compile failed)");
00058         return PCAP_COMPILE_ERROR;
00059     }
00060 
00061     if (pcap_setfilter(c->descr, &(c->fp)) == -1) {
00062         fprintf(stderr, " (pcap_setfilter failed)");
00063         return -1;
00064     }
00065     pcap_loop(c->descr, c->numOfPackets, func, arg);
00066 
00067     return 0;
00068 
00069 }
